description:
Teltina, is the third princess of the kingdom of Avallost, joined by her Hero, Lowji. She is on a crusader to combat a threat to the people, and eager to recruit Yihdra and Togo, but her knight in shining armor isn`t quite as enthusiastic...
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Sentai Red to Yuusha to Hime-sama
The Red Ranger, the Hero, and the Princess
戦隊レッドと勇者と姫様
